name: riteway
description: Unit tests that always supply a good bug report when they fail.

scripts.typecheck: npx -p typescript tsc --esModuleInterop --rootDir . source/test.js --allowJs --checkJs --noEmit --lib es6 --jsx react && npx -p typescript tsc index.d.ts --noEmit && echo 'TypeScript check complete.'
scripts.esm: cp source/*.js esm/ && cp esm/riteway.js esm/index.js && echo 'esm complete.'
scripts.watch: watch 'clear && npm run -s test | tap-nirvana && npm run -s lint && npm run -s typecheck && npm run -s esm' source
scripts.precommit: npm run -s test && npm run -s lint-fix && npm run -s typecheck

author: Eric Elliott
